TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DetailsViewDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner

summary.span: 在可视化设计器中为 控件提供设计时支持。

span.span: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在可视化设计器中，当您从源切换到设计视图时，将分析描述控件的标记源代码， 并在设计图面上创建控件的设计时版本。In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes the control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface. 切换回源视图时，会将设计时控件持久保存到标记源代码，并将其编辑到网页的标记中。When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page. 类的属性 提供以下功能：The properties of the class provide the following functionality: - 属性返回一个 对象，该对象通常包含一个对象，该对象是从 设计器的继承树中的每个级别派生的。The property returns a object, which typically contains an object that is derived from the class for each level in the inheritance tree of the designer. - 属性返回格式设置方案的集合，以便在 "**自动套用格式**" 对话框中显示。The property returns a collection of formatting schemes for display in the **Auto Format** dialog box. - 属性为关联的控件的字段 和顶层模板返回模板组的集合 。The property returns a collection of template groups for the fields of the associated control and the top level templates. - 属性始终返回 `true` ，指示设计器创建关联控件的临时副本 以生成设计时标记。The property always returns `true`, indicating that the designer creates a temporary copy of the associated control to generate the design-time markup. 类方法提供了以下功能：The class methods provide the following functionality: - 方法将关联控件绑定 到设计时数据源。The method binds the associated control to a design-time data source. - 方法返回用于在设计时呈现关联的标记 。The method returns the markup that is used to render the associated at design time. - 方法准备设计器，以查看、编辑和设计关联的 。The method prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated . - 当单击关联的设计时视图的区域时，将调用方法 。The method is called when a region of the design-time view of the associated is clicked. - 当关联的数据源的架构发生更改时，将调用方法 。The method is called when the schema of the data source of the associated changes. - 方法用于移除或添加其他属性，或用于隐藏关联的的属性 。The method is used to remove or add additional properties or to shadow properties of the associated . 控件不支持设计时可编辑区域 ，因此 和 方法不具有任何功能。Design-time editable regions are not supported in the control, so the and methods have no functionality. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何扩展 类，以便在设计时更改从控件派生的控件的外观 。The following code example shows how to extend the class to change the appearance of controls that are derived from the control at design time. 该示例从派生 `MyDetailsView` 控件 。The example derives the `MyDetailsView` control from the . `MyDetailsView`只是控件的副本 。The `MyDetailsView` is simply a copy of the control. 该示例还派生了 `MyDetailsViewDesigner` 类 ，并 `MyDetailsViewDesigner` 在控件上放置了的对象 `MyDetailsView` 。The example also derives the `MyDetailsViewDesigner` class from and places a object for `MyDetailsViewDesigner` on the `MyDetailsView` control. `The MyDetailsViewDesigner` 重写 属性以指定的设计时视图的页导航行 `MyDetailsView` 包含五个页面链接。`The MyDetailsViewDesigner` overrides the property to specify that the pager row of the design-time view of the `MyDetailsView` contain five page links. 它重写 方法，使 属性在设计时在 **属性** 网格中可见。It overrides the method to make the property visible in the **Property** grid at design time. 它重写 方法，以便 在设计时将属性作为新的第一行添加到网格中（如果已指定） `MyDetailsView` 。It overrides the method to include the property, if it is specified, as a new first row in the `MyDetailsView` grid at design time. 如果 的属性 `MyDetailsView` 为 或 值，则会在 控件周围绘制一个蓝色虚线边框，使其范围更可见。If the property of the `MyDetailsView` is the or value, the draws a blue dashed border around the control to make its extent more visible. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner/CS/detailsviewdesigner.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner/VB/detailsviewdesigner.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当在 设计图面上创建关联控件或该控件的副本时，.NET Framework 在内部构造该类的新实例。The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the class when it creates the associated control or a copy of that control on the design surface.

value.span: 一个 ，它包含 的预定义方案。

span.span: A that contains the predefined schemes for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是从内部类的 XML 编码成员填充的。The is populated from an XML-encoded member of an internal class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void DataBind(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl dataBoundControl) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub DataBind (dataBoundControl As BaseDataBoundControl)

param.name: dataBoundControl
param.span: 要绑定到设计时数据源的 控件。

span.span: The control to bind to the design-time data source.

summary.span: 将关联控件绑定到设计时数据源。

span.span: Binds the associated control to the design-time data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将关联控件绑定 到设计时数据源，并基于为指定的功能计算页导航数和所需的自动生成的行数 。The method binds the associated control to the design-time data source and calculates the number of pager and automatically generated rows that are required, based on features that are specified for the . `dataBoundControl`参数表示 与此设计器关联的控件或该控件的副本。The `dataBoundControl` parameter represents the control that is associated with this designer, or a copy of that control.

summary.span: 获取用于在设计时呈现关联的 控件的标记。

span.span: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetDesignTimeHtml() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetDesignTimeHtml () As String

summary.span: 获取用于在设计时呈现关联控件的标记。

span.span: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time.

returns.span: 一个 ，其中包含用于在设计时呈现 的标记。

span.span: A containing the markup used to render the at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 首先， `true` 如果 集合为空，则方法将控件的属性设置为。First, the method sets the property of the control to `true`, if the collection is empty. 如果无法获取数据源的架构，则将该控件的集合设置为空 数组。The then sets the collection of the control to an empty array if the schema of the data source cannot be obtained. 它将刷新 对象，以强制 调用方法。It refreshes the object to force the method to be called. 然后，它调用基方法来生成标记。It then calls the base method to generate the markup. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 在从类继承的类中重写方法 ，以便 在设计时更改控件的外观。The following code example shows how to override the method in a class inherited from the class to change the appearance of the control at design time. 如果定义了，则该示例向网格中添加一个新的第一行以包含 属性 。The example adds a new first row to the grid to contain the property, if the is defined. 如果 派生自的控件的属性 为 或 值，则会在 控件周围绘制一个蓝色虚线边框，使其范围更可见。If the property of the control that is derived from is the or value, the draws a blue dashed border around the control to make its extent more visible. 它不会更改控件的运行时外观。It does not change the run-time appearance of the control. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner/CS/detailsviewdesigner.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner/VB/detailsviewdesigner.vb#4)]

para.span: 如果重写 方法，请务必调用基方法，因为它最终会通过多个重写级别、对控件的调用 或控件的副本来生成标记。

span.span: If you override the method, be sure to call the base method because it eventually, through several override levels, calls on the control or a copy of the control to generate the markup.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetDesignTimeHtml(class System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection regions) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetDesignTimeHtml (regions As DesignerRegionCollection) As String

param.name: regions
param.span: 一个 ，它将向其中添加控件设计时视图的可选择和可单击区域的定义。

span.span: A to which to add definitions of the selectable and clickable regions in the design-time view of the control.

summary.span: 获取用于在设计时呈现关联控件的标记，并填充设计器区域的集合。

span.span: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time and populates a collection of designer regions.

returns.span: 一个 ，其中包含用于在设计时呈现 的标记。

span.span: A containing the markup used to render the at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用 方法来生成控件的设计时呈现的标记 。The method calls the method to generate the markup for the design-time rendering of the control. 方法还会 `regions` 为设计时呈现的每个可单击或可选择的区域填充一个对象。The method also populates `regions` with a object for each clickable or selectable region of the design-time rendering. 对于 ，每行中的第一个单元格是可选的; 行中的所有单元格都是可单击的。For the , the first cell in each row is selectable; all the cells in the rows are clickable. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 在从类继承的类中重写方法 ，以便 在设计时更改控件的外观。The following code example shows how to override the method in a class that is inherited from the class to change the appearance of the control at design time. 如果定义了，则该示例向网格中添加一个新的第一行以包含 属性 。The example adds a new first row to the grid to contain the property, if the is defined. 如果 派生自的控件的属性 为 或 值，则会在 控件周围绘制一个蓝色虚线边框，使其范围更可见。If the property of the control that is derived from the is the or value, the draws a blue dashed border around the control to make its extent more visible. 它不会更改控件的运行时外观。It does not change the run-time appearance of the control. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner/CS/detailsviewdesigner.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner/VB/detailsviewdesigner.vb#4)]

para.span: 如果重写 方法，请务必调用基方法或 重载，因为它们最终会经过多个重写级别，对 控件或控件的副本调用以生成标记。

span.span: If you override the method, be sure to call the base method or the overload because they eventually, through several override levels, call on the control or a copy of the control to generate the markup.

Public Overrides Sub Initialize (component As IComponent)

span.span: A , control which implements an .

summary.span: 准备设计器，以查看、编辑和设计关联的组件。

span.span: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当设计器宿主 准备好使用设计器呈现控件时，将调用方法 。The designer host calls the method when it is ready to use the designer to render the control. 及其基方法会配置属性并设置设计器操作所需的事件。The and its base methods configure properties and set up events that are necessary for the operation of the designer. `component`参数表示 与此设计器关联的控件或该控件的副本。The `component` parameter represents the control that is associated with this designer or a copy of that control.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnClick(class System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnClick (e As DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs)

param.name: e
param.span: 一个 ，它定义控件的被单击区域。

span.span: A that defines the clicked region of the control.

summary.span: 当单击关联控件设计时视图的区域时，会调用它。

span.span: Called when a region of the design-time view for the associated control is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法保存选定的区域索引，并更新 在设计图面上呈现控件的标记。The method saves the selected region index and updates the markup that renders the control on the design surface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnSchemaRefreshed() cil managed

summary.span: 当关联控件的数据源架构更改时，将调用它。

span.span: Called when the schema of the data source for the associated control changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除非设计器处于模板编辑模式或正在添加或编辑字段，否则 方法会调用 方法，该方法又调用 方法来更新 控件以反映数据源更改。Unless the designer is in template editing mode or a field is being added or edited, the method calls the method, which in turn calls the method to update the control to reflect the data source change.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void PreFilterProperties(class System.Collections.IDictionary properties) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub PreFilterProperties (properties As IDictionary)

param.name: properties
param.span: 实现添加的和隐藏的属性的 的集合。

span.span: A collection implementing the of the added and shadowed properties.

summary.span: 供设计器使用，以从 网格的显示中移除属性或向其添加属性或者隐藏关联控件的属性。

span.span: Used by the designer to remove properties from or add properties to the display in the grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件设计器使用从方法派生的方法，使用 设计器实现的相应设计时属性隐藏各种控件属性，以及向网格中添加或删除属性 `Properties` 。Control designers use methods derived from the method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add properties to or remove properties from the `Properties` grid. 对于 控件， `false` 当控件处于模板模式时，方法将属性的对象设置为。For the control, the method sets the object of the property to `false` when the control is in template mode. 这可确保不能使用对话框删除处于模板模式下的列 `Fields` 。This ensures that a column that is in template mode cannot be deleted using the `Fields` dialog box. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 在从类继承的类中重写方法 ，以便 `Properties` 在设计时更改控件的网格。The following code example shows how to override the method in a class that is inherited from the class to change the `Properties` grid of the control at design time. 该示例使 属性在网格中可见 `Properties` 。The example makes the property visible in the `Properties` grid. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner/CS/detailsviewdesigner.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner/VB/detailsviewdesigner.vb#3)]

para.span: 重写 方法，以便在设计时属性集合中将属性添加到属性或更改属性的属性。

span.span: Override the method to add properties to or change attributes of properties in the design-time property collection.

para.span: 请确保在执行其他处理之前调用基方法。

span.span: Be sure to call the base method before performing other processing.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property SampleRowCount As Integer
protected: virtual property int SampleRowCount { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取要显示的关联控件的示例行数。

span.span: Gets the number of sample rows for the associated control to display.
The number of sample rows to show.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性始终返回数字 `2` 。The property always returns the number `2`. 这将导致在设计时在控件的页导航行中显示两个页面链接 。This causes two page links to be displayed in the pager row of the control at design time. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 从类继承的类中的属性 ，以更改设计时在控件的页导航行中显示的页面链接数 。The following code example shows how to override the property in a class inherited from the class to change the number of page links appearing in the pager row of the control at design time. 该示例将导致显示5个页面链接。The example causes five page links to be displayed. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner/CS/detailsviewdesigner.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner/VB/detailsviewdesigner.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 方法没有任何功能; 控件设计时视图中不支持可编辑区域 。The method has no functionality; there is no support for editable regions in the design-time view of the control.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property TemplateGroups As TemplateGroupCollection

summary.span: 获取用于关联控件字段的模板组集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of template groups for the fields of the associated control.

value.span: 一个 ，其中为 控件中的每个模板化字段包含一个元素。

span.span: A containing an element for each templated field in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性构造对象的集合 ，每个对象对应一个模板化数据字段，另一个用于每个控件字段 (如关联控件中的页眉、页脚和页导航) 。The property constructs a collection of objects, one for each templated data field and one for each control field (such as header, footer, and pager) in the associated control. 数据字段 元素具有 每个预定义的行模板类型的对象。The data field elements have a object for each of the predefined row template types. 控件字段 元素包含单个 。The control field elements contain a single .

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property UsePreviewControl As Boolean
protected: virtual property bool UsePreviewControl { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示设计器是否应使用临时副本（而非与设计器关联的实际控件）来生成设计时标记。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the designer should use a temporary copy, rather than the actual control associated with the designer, to generate the design-time markup.
Always .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于 属性始终为 `true` ，因此设计器使用 包含关联控件的副本的控件 来生成设计时标记。Because the property is always `true`, the designer uses a control that contains a copy of the associated control to generate the design-time markup. 控件不影响的任何持久性 。The control does not affect any persistence for the . 如果 已重写属性以返回 `false` ，设计器将使用关联的 控件本身来生成设计时标记。If the property has been overridden to return `false`, the designer will use the associated control itself to generate the design-time markup.

para.span: 您可以重写 属性以返回 或根据控件是否用类级别对象标记来确定其值 。

span.span: You can override the property to return or to determine its value based on whether the control is marked with a class level object.

para.span: 如果 未重写，则 对象将忽略 。

span.span: If the is not overridden, the object ignores the .
